attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear all,

Due the e-mail that you may have read, I feel that it is time for the/our govenment, mp's, large business and people of all racies to STAMP OUT RACISM.  

The freedom of speach act seems to suit few and far between, but it should and must never be used to incite racism in any form. If these large orgainisation that we put are trust in do nothing about this protest or to prevent further protess like this, then it will show the nation and the world the extent that the govenment, police and all organisation like these see black people and all other people of different nationalities as expendable.  

Please add your name, country your signing from to the list, to STAMP OUT RACISM, starting with here and hopefully with the rest of the world. 

Thank you for your help and support.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
